text:
Helmed by Zoya Akhtar, Gully Boy has lived upto the hype that it created and emerged as a winner at the box-office. In less than a week of its release, Gully Boy has earned about 80 crore, as claimed by a report in Box Office India.
Talking about Ranveer, he said, "I was awestruck by his commitment, he was so committed to his part, I didn't see the party animal in Ranveer Singh. I didn't see it for once and I am being completely honest. I saw that Ranveer Singh on the wrap party, the crazy Ranveer Singh with energy. On the sets, he was just Murad. Totally introvert, into himself, extremely inhibited, just trying to channelise all his energy inward. So beautiful to see, so pleasant on the sets. He was invisible."
Don't Miss
The actor was present on the sidelines of the T20 Dhamaal shoot at a sports channel studio in New Delhi. "I think a sequel to Nayak would be a good idea,'' Anil told IANS when asked which film of his deserves a sequel.
Following which, Pakistani singer Atif Aslam has reportedly been removed from Notebook, a film produced by Salman Khan Films. According to the reports, the producers associated with the film have reportedly decided to contribute Rs 22 lakh for the families of martyrs of the terror attack.
Rock band Queen is all set to perform at the upcoming 91st Academy Awards ceremony, with Adam Lambert on vocals. The reports were confirmed when the Motion Picture Academy made the announcement on social media on Monday, reports variety.com.
title: Ranveer Singh's 'Gully Boy' Is On Top News Trends And More From The World Of Entertainment
description: It's A Hat-trick! Ranveer Singh Strikes Gold Again As Gully Boy Earns Over Rs 75 Crore And Becomes A Hit! Helmed by Zoya Akhtar, Gully Boy has lived upto the hype that it created and emerged as a winner at the box-office. In less than a week of its release, Gully Boy has earned about 80 crore, as claimed by a report in Box Office India.
